item.title: ALB and API Gateway

item.title: A Roadmap to Cloud Centre of Excellence Adoption
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mUTGdSA60Ao introduction - Cloud Centre of Excellence is a team that can help the organisation for cloud adoption role & responsible characteristic for the team member best practice Characteristic> Characteristic # driving the organisation forward has ability to stand up - open-minded be confident why and how to do it - clear minded / big picture thinkers diverse and cross-functional Skill Set> Skill Set # Cost management Project Management (Transparent) Cloud operation engineer (CI/CD) Data engineer (new currency, capture data from IoT, video stream) Application Security (IAM, Policy, Firewall) Best Practise> Best Practise # Keep passion & excitement Start small (5-7 ppl in a team) Rotate people (training) Communication Scaling and reorganising Think of the failover and backup plan Cloud training for organisation Bill, cost optimization Empower the team (courage them trying new role, new service, bleeding-edge tech) Gain transparency (everyone knows the progress…why you do that…) Notes> Notes # cloud makes anything as code -> code makes things more transparent -> the complexity of the project is reduced many jobs can be automated through cloud and they are automatically documented as code is it possible to create a roadmap / resources library for the whole organisation (like AWS workshop)?
